Microsoft Appoints Satya Nadella as President of Server and Tools Business, Feb. 9, 2011/ PRNewswire/-- Microsoft Corp. today promoted Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services, said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . " Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future

show co-host assured viewers Wednesday that his health wasn't a factor, saying, "No, I'm not sick." Regis Philbin went on to hold up newspaper clips with stories about his announcement. down the pipeline," the minister said. Labour claimed the decision to appoint Andy Coulson to such a senior Downing Street post raised questions about David Cameron 's judgment. Ed Miliband , the Labour leader, said: The cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine. He's now done the right thing but he should have done it earlier. I think it raises real questions about David Cameron 's judgment that he hung on to Andy Coulson for so long. Downing Street sources dismissed Labour's criticism and insisted the prime minister believed that Andy Coulson 's professionalism in sharpening up the Tories' media operation after his appointment in 2007 vindicated David Cameron 's original decision.
